title: Secretary Information Shahera Shahid mourns PIO’s father’s demise
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 20 (APP): Federal Secretary of Information and Broadcasting, Shahera Shahid, conveyed her profound condolences on Saturday following the passing of the father of Principal Information Officer (PIO), Mubashir Hassan.
In her message of sympathy, she expressed deep sorrow and heartfelt condolences to PIO Mubashir Hassan and his family.
She shared that she was greatly saddened upon hearing the news of Mubashir Hassan’s father’s demise, emphasizing the pivotal role a father plays within a family and acknowledging the irreplaceable void left behind.
Shahera Shahid assured that she stands in solidarity with the grieving family during this difficult time.
She prayed to Allah Almighty for the departed soul’s rest in eternal peace and for the bereaved family to find strength and resilience in coping with their loss.
